entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Over 26,000 US citizens are now dead due to the ignorance, arrogance, and inaction of President Trump. Warned about the COVID-19 pandemic, he ignored it. Trump betrayed his oath of office, and he betrayed the citizens of the USA.
